body: Si está leyendo este comentario, sus padres morirán dentro de 5 años. Para deshacer esta maldición, debes copiarlo y pegarlo en otros 5 manga

No idea what to think about this one.

@NeinNeinNein I read what you commented. But, all I got from that was, and I'm paraphrasing, "I'm too insecure about my sexuality. So, I've deluded myself into thinking that I have no homosexual predilections whatsoever, and I use those delusions to reconcile the fact that I criticize people with comparable sensibilities to my own."

However, if we accept the premise that Futanari, more specifically Futanari x Male/Male x Futanari, is virtually indistinguishable from Yaoi, then I still fail to see why you have a hard time understanding why some people would like it. The only thing that implies is that at least some of the people who like stories involving futanari and males having sex are more conscious of their own sexuality and might also appreciate Yaoi.
